string-array.name: blood_donation_quotes
string-array.item: "The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"A life may depend on a gesture from you, a bottle of Blood."
"Your blood donation can save a life, or even several."
"Donate your blood for a reason, let the reason to be life."
"To give blood you need neither extra strength nor extra food, and you will save a life."
"A single pint can save three lives, a single gesture can create a million smiles."
"The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"Don't wait until disaster strikes to give blood."
"Blood donation is the real act of humanity."
"The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito."
"The blood is red gold in time of saving a life."
"There is no great joy than saving a soul."
"Heroes come in all types and sizes."
"The blood is red gold in time of saving a life."
"There is no great joy than saving a soul."
"Heroes come in all types and sizes."
"Blood donation is the real act of humanity."
"The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito."
"Donate blood and be the reason of smile to many faces."
"The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"Blood donation will cost you nothing but it will save a life!"
"Your blood is replaceable. A life is not."
"One day, I'll be gone. But my truth will live on: Give."
"The blood is red gold in time of saving a life."
"There is no great joy than saving a soul."
"Heroes come in all types and sizes."
"Blood donation is the real act of humanity."
"The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito."
"Donate blood and be the reason of smile to many faces."
"The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"Blood donation will cost you nothing but it will save a life!"
"Your blood is replaceable. A life is not."
"One day, I'll be gone. But my truth will live on: Give."
"You don’t have to be a doctor to save lives, just donate blood."
"Blood donation is the real act of humanity."
"Share a little, care a little – Donate Blood."
"The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"To the young and healthy, it’s no loss. To sick, it’s hope of life."
"Blood donors are the silent heroes, saving lives with their gifts."
"Your blood donation can give a precious smile to someone’s face."
"Blood donation is the real act of humanity."
"A life may depend on a gesture from you, a bottle of Blood."
"The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"Donate blood and be the reason of smile to many faces."
"The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life."
"Blood donation is the real act of humanity."
"Share a little, care a little – Donate Blood."
"To the young and healthy, it’s no loss. To sick, it’s hope of life."
"Blood donors are the silent heroes, saving lives with their gifts."
"Your blood donation can give a precious smile to someone’s face."
"Saving lives one donation at a time."
"A small act can have a big impact."
"The gift of blood is the gift of life."
"A single donation can make a big difference."
"Be a part of the life-saving team."
"Every drop of blood makes a difference."
"Your blood is needed now more than ever."
"Give blood, give hope to the hopeless."
"Donating blood is a gift of kindness."
"Be a part of something bigger, donate blood."
"Your blood donation can light up someone's life."
"Be a ray of hope, donate blood."
